name: SquishySlimes
description:
Your cute slime friends are in need of your help, keep them alive by catching them before they hit walls or arrows!

Move using WASD or arrow keys.

I've played with engines in the past but this is my first game, feedback is greatly appreciated.
This was made in 5 hours using cts.js.

Thank you all for playing!

0.0.1 - Fixed slime spawn capping at 2 and sound not looping

Art credit goes to:
